EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Brooke Crouter (1355259659.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Brooke Crouter (1355259659.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Brooke, Great to hear from you, I would love to schedule a call to review these questions and others. Please click here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> to view my online schedule so you can schedule a time that works for you. I will address your questions below as well. Looking forward to connecting! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Brooke Crouter [mailto:bcrouter@lohfeldconsulting.com] Sent: Tuesday, December 11, 2012 9:09 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Brooke Crouter Sara:Ive been debating whether or not I am ready to take the leap to MBO partners, but first I need to explore some of my questions. For example:1) Do you hold clearances for your associates? Yes, please see this link <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf>. 2) Can you provide a list of firms with whom you have established contracts so I know if my potential clients are covered? Many of our clients are listed here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf>, if you are looking a specific firm just shoot me an email with their name and I can look them up in our system to see if we have an agreement with them. 3) Can you be an MBO partner and also associated with another firm that provides staffing services? Many 1099s work for multiple firms  do you allow that? Yes, we have MANY staffing companies as clients. JI am sure I have many more questions, but I have not yet catalogued them all. Could you find some time next week for a phone call to go over some of these questions? Right now, I have some flexibility on scheduling on Wed/Thurs/Fri next week. Thanks Brooke Crouter301-580-3839 From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Friday, August 17, 2012 5:58 PM To: Brooke Crouter Subject: MBO Partners / Brooke Crouter Hello Brooke, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0zMzQmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTMzNCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODkzMTImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ5NDA3NzEmZW1haWxpZD1iY3JvdXRlckBsb2hmZWxkY29uc3VsdGluZy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTk1MzUwJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7u8oWbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0zMzQmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTMzNCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODkzMTImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ5NDA3NzEmZW1haWxpZD1iY3JvdXRlckBsb2hmZWxkY29uc3VsdGluZy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTk1MzUwJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7u8oWbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X></htm
